scenes.description: Omaru Polka finishes performing the opening song on a stage filled with flames.
MC section where Polka welcomes the audience, introduces the live title and hashtag, and talks about the stage.
Omaru Polka and Shiranui Flare perform a duet song with a galaxy theme.

subtitles.original: 解き放って
subtitles.english: Unleash it,

subtitles.original: 自由の扉 開いてく
subtitles.english: Opening the door to freedom.

subtitles.original: 強く果てない未来へ
subtitles.english: Towards a strong, endless future.

subtitles.original: そうきっとここから始まる
subtitles.english: Yes, surely it starts from here.

subtitles.original: お待たせみんなー！
subtitles.english: Sorry to keep you waiting, everyone!

subtitles.original: 今年もポルカの誕生日が始まったー！
subtitles.english: Polka's birthday has started again this year!

subtitles.original: タイトルは、かっこいい『Glitter of Love』！
subtitles.english: The title is the cool "Glitter of Love"!

subtitles.original: というわけで、ハッシュタグはこちら！
subtitles.english: So, the hashtag is this!

subtitles.original: 尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2026で
subtitles.english: With #OmaruPolkaBirthday2026,

subtitles.original: いっぱい、いーっぱいつぶやいてねー！
subtitles.english: Please tweet lots and lots!

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Okaaay!

subtitles.original: いやー、今回のテーマはまず、
subtitles.english: Well, the theme this time is firstly,

subtitles.original: 愛と勇気と戦う女の子になってまーす！
subtitles.english: I'm becoming a girl who fights with love and courage!

subtitles.original: そして、見てくださいこのステージ！
subtitles.english: And, please look at this stage!

subtitles.original: えい！
subtitles.english: Ei!

subtitles.original: はーっ、すごい広い！
subtitles.english: Haa, it's so wide!

subtitles.original: おー、なんとですね、広いんですけれども
subtitles.english: Oh, surprisingly, although it's wide,

subtitles.original: まずスクリーンが超でっかい！大迫力！
subtitles.english: First of all, the screen is super huge! Very impressive!

subtitles.original: なんと何かいつもの3倍くらい頑張りました。
subtitles.english: Surprisingly, somehow I worked about 3 times harder than usual.

subtitles.original: いや頑張ってもらいました！
subtitles.english: No, I had them work hard!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: というわけでですね、
subtitles.english: So, with that said,

subtitles.original: ここからゲストの方々がたくさんいらっしゃいます！
subtitles.english: From here on, many guests will be joining!

subtitles.original: もうホロメンだけなら多分
subtitles.english: If we're talking about Holo-members only, probably

subtitles.original: 尾丸ポルカ史上最多のゲスト数だと思っております！
subtitles.english: I think it's the highest number of guests in Omaru Polka history!

subtitles.original: それをね、これからノンストップでお送りするので、
subtitles.english: I'll be sending that to you non-stop from now on, so

subtitles.original: 楽しんでいってください！
subtitles.english: Please enjoy it!

subtitles.original: というわけで、行くぞー！
subtitles.english: So, here we go!

subtitles.original: 遺伝子レベルの Independence
subtitles.english: Gene-level Independence.

subtitles.original: 絶望も希望も抱いて
subtitles.english: Embracing both despair and hope.

subtitles.original: 足掻け 命尽きるまで
subtitles.english: Struggle until your life runs out.

subtitles.original: 光と飛沫の Kiss
subtitles.english: A Kiss of light and spray.

subtitles.original: 恋のような虹の Birthday
subtitles.english: A rainbow Birthday like love.

subtitles.original: どんな美しき日も
subtitles.english: No matter what beautiful day,

subtitles.original: 何か生まれ 何かが死ぬ
subtitles.english: Something is born, something dies.

subtitles.original: せめて歌を I love you
subtitles.english: At least a song, I love you.

subtitles.original: 世界が酷い地獄だとしても
subtitles.english: Even if the world is a cruel hell,

subtitles.original: せめて伝えよう I love you
subtitles.english: At least let me convey, I love you.

subtitles.original: 解放の時は来た
subtitles.english: The time for liberation has come.

subtitles.original: 星降る天へと響き飛べ Everybody song
subtitles.english: Resound and fly to the starry heavens, Everybody song.

subtitles.original: Stardust
subtitles.english: Stardust

subtitles.original: そして奇跡は待つものじゃなくて
subtitles.english: And miracles aren't something you wait for,

subtitles.original: その手で作るものと吠えろ
subtitles.english: Roar that it's something you make with your own hands.

subtitles.original: 涙したがるオリガミを レクイエムにして
subtitles.english: Making the origami that wants to cry into a requiem.

subtitles.original: 聖なる善の力で
subtitles.english: With the power of holy goodness,

subtitles.original: 輝け Future world
subtitles.english: Shine, Future world.

subtitles.original: 信じ照らせ 星天ギャラクシィクロス
subtitles.english: Believe and illuminate, Seiten Galaxy Cross.

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないことを
subtitles.english: That you are not alone.

subtitles.original: やがて君は知る日のため
subtitles.english: For the day you will eventually know.

subtitles.original: 指先伝う熱を
subtitles.english: The heat transmitted through fingertips,

subtitles.original: 分かち合って明日に向かう
subtitles.english: Sharing it and heading towards tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 永遠なる空に I feel you
subtitles.english: In the eternal sky, I feel you.

subtitles.original: 自由の魂は殺せはしない
subtitles.english: The soul of freedom cannot be killed.

subtitles.original: 不滅なる夢に I feel you
subtitles.english: In the immortal dream, I feel you.

subtitles.original: 来世と手を握れ
subtitles.english: Hold hands with the afterlife.

subtitles.original: 運命も終曲も断ち切る力で
subtitles.english: With the power to sever fate and the finale.

subtitles.original: そして重ねた夢...
subtitles.english: And the layered dreams...
